DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate efficacy drug-eluting balloon angioplasty follow versus conventional balloon angioplasty superficial femoral artery popliteal artery re-stenosis .
DOC.brief_title: Drug Eluting Balloon Peripheral Intervention In-Stent Restenosis
DOC.criteria: age > 18 year intermittent claudication ( Fontane III IV ) angiographic stenosis > 50 % occlusion superficial femoralpopliteal artery > 40mm , previously treat nitinol stent implantation , least one belowknee vessel ankle allergy Paclitaxel contraindication combine antiplatelet treatment life expectancy < 1 year hypersensitivity contraindication one study drug lack consent need amputation angiographic evidence stent fracture
